class.name: openarm_hardware/OpenArm_v10HW
class.description: ros2_control hardware interface for OpenArm V10 (MIT mode only).

class.name: openarm_hardware/OpenArm_v10DualModeHW
class.description: Dual-mode ros2_control hardware interface for OpenArm V10. Supports both MIT mode (effort interface) and Position-Velocity mode (position interface).

class.name: openarm_hardware/OpenArm_v10RTHardware
class.description: RT-safe dual-mode hardware interface for OpenArm V10 using lower-priority worker thread. Supports both MIT mode (effort interface) and Position-Velocity mode (position interface).
